bio: A crony of Mckraken. It was promised fair fights only in Mckraken’s political rallies.

soultimate.name: Venomous Feint
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drops foe's Attack by 50% for 30 seconds.
soultimate.description: Foes' attack is greatly decreased for a time.

skill.effect: Heals extra HP on a Yo-kai who is in danger.
skill.name: Second Wind

name: W. Slitheref
